column6: Ms. Marvel enlists in the Civil War! Having advocated on behalf of the registered superheroes, Ms. Marvel takes a position training new heroes. Soon, a traitor is discovered and all hell breaks loose!
column8: | penciller:Roberto Delatorre | penciller (cover):David Mack | inker:Jimmy Palmiotti | writer:Brian Reed | letterer:Dave Sharpe | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
